text: [Jahudijon] Har kuco joft savand, [doƣi nangu] xori ʙar onon zada sudaast; magar on ki dar panohi amoni Alloh taolo va mardum ʙosand; va onon ʙa xasme az Alloh taolo giriftor sudaand va [doƣi] darmondagi ʙar onon zada sudaast. In ʙad-on saʙaʙ ʙud, ki ʙa ojoti Alloh taolo kufr mevarzidand va pajomʙaronro ʙa nohaq mekustand; [va niz] in [sazo] ʙa xotiri on ʙud, ki nofarmoni kardand va az hudud [-i ilohi] tacovuz menamudand
